scenario_text.value: Hey, is that...?

Aoi and Labramon? I wonder what they’re
talking about.

You know something, Labramon? Walking around
here made me realize something.

The people who lived here led really full
lives.

Yeah. You can really tell that people lived
here wherever you look... Hey!

Aoi, I see something shiny over there!
I wonder what it could be?
Whoa! It’s a barrette! How pretty!
A barrette? What’s that?
It’s basically a hair clip.

Ooh, I bet it’d look really great on you!
You should try it on!
No, I think I’m good.
Huh? Why not?

I really don’t think I look good wearing
bright and shiny stuff like that.

Oh, okay... Well, I’m gonna put it somewhere
nobody else will ever find it!
Huh? Why’d you get rid of it?

I thought it’d fit you perfectly, but if
that’s how you feel, then I had no choice.

Now let’s get going. We’re wasting time just
standing around like this.
Right, okay...
If you’re sure, Labramon.

I really am sure it’d look great on you
though, Aoi!
All right, then... How about this?

That DEFINITELY suits you.
You should have it!
Are you sure?

Of course! I mean, I just found it lying
around, but still.

Hee hee, well, thank you, Labramon.
You’re very sweet and it makes me happy.
